where.label: WR1
where.expression: EXISTS(internal_location) OR EXISTS(street_number) OR EXISTS(street) OR EXISTS(postal_box) OR EXISTS(town) OR EXISTS(region) OR EXISTS(postal_code) OR EXISTS(country) OR EXISTS(facsimile_number) OR EXISTS(telephone_number) OR EXISTS(electronic_mail_address) OR EXISTS(telex_number)

entity.name: measure_with_unit
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(length_measure_with_unit, mass_measure_with_unit, time_measure_with_unit, electric_current_measure_with_unit, thermodynamic_temperature_measure_with_unit, celsius_temperature_measure_with_unit, amount_of_substance_measure_with_unit, luminous_intensity_measure_with_unit, plane_angle_measure_with_unit, solid_angle_measure_with_unit, area_measure_with_unit, volume_measure_with_unit, ratio_measure_with_unit)

entity.name: named_unit
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(si_unit, conversion_based_unit, context_dependent_unit) ANDOR ONEOF(length_unit, mass_unit, time_unit, electric_current_unit, thermodynamic_temperature_unit, amount_of_substance_unit, luminous_intensity_unit, plane_angle_unit, solid_angle_unit, area_unit, volume_unit, ratio_unit)

where.label: WR2
where.expression: NOT ('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.PRODUCT' IN TYPEOF(SELF\document_product_association.related_product)) OR ((SELF\document_product_association.relating_document.kind.product_data_type = 'configuration controlled document') AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(prpc <* USEDIN(SELF\document_product_association.related_product, 'AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.' + 'PRODUCT_RELATED_PRODUCT_CATEGORY.PRODUCTS') | prpc.name = 'document')) = 1))

where.label: WR3
where.expression: NOT ('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.PRODUCT_DEFINITION_FORMATION' IN TYPEOF(SELF.related_product)) OR ((SELF\document_product_association.relating_document.kind.product_data_type = 'configuration controlled document version') AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(prpc <* USEDIN(SELF.related_product\product_definition_formation.of_product, 'AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.PRODUCT_RELATED_PRODUCT_CATEGORY.PRODUCTS') | prpc.name = 'document')) = 1))

where.label: WR4
where.expression: NOT ('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.PRODUCT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF(SELF.related_product)) OR ((SELF\document_product_association.relating_document.kind.product_data_type = 'configuration controlled document definition') AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(prpc <* USEDIN(SELF\document_product_association.related_product\product_definition.formation.of_product, 'AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.PRODUCT_RELATED_PRODUCT_CATEGORY.PRODUCTS') | prpc.name = 'document')) = 1))

entity.name: task_element
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(concurrent_task_element, end_task, exit_loop, looping_element, task_element_sequence, task_step)

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(ci <* items | SIZEOF(QUERY(ata <* USEDIN(ci, 'AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.MULTI_LANGUAGE_ATTRIBUTE_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS') | (ata\attribute_value_assignment.attribute_name = SELF\attribute_value_assignment.attribute_name) AND (ata.translation_language :=: translation_language))) > 1)) = 0

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(ci <* items | SIZEOF(QUERY(ata <* USEDIN(ci, 'AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.ATTRIBUTE_LANGUAGE_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS') | (ata\attribute_classification_assignment.role.name = 'primary') AND (ata\attribute_classification_assignment.attribute_name = SELF\attribute_value_assignment.attribute_name) AND (ata\attribute_classification_assignment.assigned_class :=: translation_language))) > 0)) = 0

entity.name: binary_numeric_expression
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(minus_expression, div_expression, mod_expression, slash_expression, power_expression, binary_function_call)

entity.name: boolean_expression
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(simple_boolean_expression, unary_boolean_expression, binary_boolean_expression, multiple_arity_boolean_expression, comparison_expression, interval_expression, boolean_defined_function)

entity.name: comparison_expression
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(comparison_equal, comparison_greater, comparison_greater_equal, comparison_less, comparison_less_equal, comparison_not_equal, like_expression)

where.label: WR1
where.expression: (('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.NUMERIC_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\binary_generic_expression.operands[1])) AND ('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.NUMERIC_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\binary_generic_expression.operands[2]))) OR (('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.BOOLEAN_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\binary_generic_expression.operands[1])) AND ('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.BOOLEAN_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\binary_generic_expression.operands[2]))) OR (('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\binary_generic_expression.operands[1])) AND ('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF\binary_generic_expression.operands[2])))

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(interval_low)) AND ('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(interval_item)) AND ('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(interval_high))

where.label: WR2
where.expression: (('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF.interval_low)) AND ('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF.interval_high)) AND ('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF.interval_item))) OR (('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF.interval_low)) AND ('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.NUMERIC_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF.interval_item)) AND ('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.NUMERIC_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(SELF.interval_high)))

entity.name: numeric_expression
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(simple_numeric_expression, unary_numeric_expression, binary_numeric_expression, multiple_arity_numeric_expression, length_function, value_function, numeric_defined_function)

entity.name: string_expression
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(simple_string_expression, index_expression, substring_expression, concat_expression, format_function, string_defined_function)

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.STRING_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(operand)) AND ('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.NUMERIC_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(index1)) AND ('AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.NUMERIC_EXPRESSION' IN TYPEOF(index2))

entity.name: unary_function_call
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(abs_function, minus_function, sin_function, cos_function, tan_function, asin_function, acos_function, exp_function, log_function, log2_function, log10_function, square_root_function)

entity.name: geometric_representation_item
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(point, direction, vector, placement, cartesian_transformation_operator, curve, surface)

function.name: is_acyclic
function.algorithm: RETURN (acyclic(arg, []));

function.name: get_role
get_description_value
get_name_value
valid_calendar_date
leap_year
valid_units
derive_dimensional_exponents
valid_measure_value
acyclic_product_definition_relationship
bag_to_set
using_representations
using_items
valid_time
acyclic_product_category_relationship
is_int_expr
is_SQL_mappable
item_in_context
get_id_value
acyclic
build_2axes
normalise
orthogonal_complement
build_axes
first_proj_axis
cross_product
scalar_times_vector
dot_product
vector_difference
dimension_of
base_axis
second_proj_axis
value_range_wr1
value_range_wr2
value_range_wr3
acyclic_representation_relationship
acyclic_mapped_representation
type_check_function
dependently_instantiated

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(x <* cartesian_point | SIZEOF(QUERY(y <* geometric_representation_context | item_in_context(x, y) AND (HIINDEX(x.coordinates) <> y.coordinate_space_dimension))) > 0)) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(x <* direction | SIZEOF(QUERY(y <* geometric_representation_context | item_in_context(x, y) AND (HIINDEX(x.direction_ratios) <> y.coordinate_space_dimension))) > 0)) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(ala1 <* attribute_language_assignment | SIZEOF(QUERY(it <* ala1.items | SIZEOF(QUERY(ala2 <* USEDIN(it, 'AP233_SYSTEM_ENGINEERING_AND_DESIGN_MIM_LF.ATTRIBUTE_LANGUAGE_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS') | (ala1\attribute_classification_assignment.attribute_name = ala2\attribute_classification_assignment.attribute_name) AND (ala1\attribute_classification_assignment.assigned_class :=: ala2\attribute_classification_assignment.assigned_class))) > 1)) > 0)) = 0

rule.name: validate_dependently_instantiable_entity_data_types
rule.appliesto: application_context attribute_value_role cartesian_transformation_operator classification_role contract_type definitional_representation document_type document_usage_constraint elementary_surface event_occurrence_role experience_role experience_type_role location_representation_role location_role organization_type_role person_type_definition_formation person_type_definition_role person_type_role placement point position_in_organization_role position_in_organization_type_role product_definition_context_role product_definition_effectivity qualification_type_role
